name: Huda Irsyad
summary: Next, we draw a line and then enter several lines of text that we defined earlier inside a list. The first line defines the starting x and y position of the text. The next two lines set the font, font-size and font-color of the text. The next two lines traverse through each element in the list and add it as a line to the text. The last line draws the text to the screen.
